metadata.Title: CVE-2022-44637 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Redmine before 4.2.9 and 5.0.x before 5.0.4 allows persistent XSS in its Textile formatter due to improper sanitization in Redcloth3 Textile-formatted fields. Depending on the configuration, this may require login as a registered user.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
